plays.text: Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Holding Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for High Sticking Chris Clark
Penalty to Craig Conroy 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dominik Hasek
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Dean McAmmond and Craig Conroy
Penalty to Steve Begin 2 minutes for Slashing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for High Sticking Steve Begin
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Interference Jukka Hentunen
Penalty to Jarome Iginla 2 minutes for Elbowing Sergei Fedorov
Goal scored by Rob Niedermayer assisted by Denis Gauthier
